name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Dislike Counter - Restore Dislike Counts
name.es: Contador Avanzado de No Me Gusta en YouTube

short.ar: أعد حسابات عدم الإعجاب على يوتيوب! راقب النسب الدقيقة للإعجاب/عدم الإعجاب.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Bring back YouTube dislike counts! See accurate like/dislike ratios.
short.de: Bringen Sie die YouTube-Nicht-gefallen-Zähler zurück! Sehen Sie genaue Verhältnis von Gefällt mir/Nicht gefallen.
short.es: Muestra el conteo de No Me Gusta en videos de YouTube y ofrece características adicionales
short.fr: Ramenez les comptes de 'Je n'aime pas' de YouTube ! Voir des ratios de 'J'aime'/'Je n'aime pas' précis.
short.hi: YouTube पर नापसंद गिनती वापस लाएँ! सटीक लाइक/नापसंद अनुपात देखें।
short.it: Riporta indietro i conteggi dei 'Non mi piace' di YouTube! Vedi rapporti accurati 'mi piace/non mi piace'.
short.ja: YouTubeの「嫌い」カウントを復活させましょう！正確な「いいね/嫌い」比率を確認してください。
short.ko: YouTube의 '싫어요' 수치를 되돌리세요! 정확한 '좋아요/싫어요' 비율을 확인하세요.
short.nl: Breng de YouTube 'niet leuk' tellingen terug! Zie nauwkeurige 'vind ik leuk/niet leuk' verhoudingen.
short.pl: Przywróć liczniki 'Nie lubię' YouTube! Zobacz dokładne proporcje 'lubię/nie lubię'.
short.pt_BR: Traga de volta as contagens de 'Não gosto' do YouTube! Veja proporções precisas de 'gosto/não gosto'.
short.ru: Верните счетчики 'Не нравится' YouTube! Смотрите точные соотношения 'нравится/не нравится'.
short.tr: YouTube videolarında dislike sayılarını gösterir ve ek özellikler sunar
short.zh_CN: 恢复 YouTube 不喜欢计数！查看准确的喜欢/不喜欢比例。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Dislike Counter - Restore Dislike Counts

Bring back the power of community feedback to your YouTube experience! Our extension restores the dislike counts that YouTube removed, helping you make informed decisions about the content you watch.

## Key Features:

🔢 **Accurate Dislike Counts**: See real-time, accurate dislike numbers for any YouTube video.

🎨 **Customizable Interface**: Personalize the dislike counter's color and size to match your preferences.

📈 **Engagement Metrics**: View comprehensive engagement data, including likes and dislikes, in an intuitive graph.

🚀 **Fast and Lightweight**: Enjoy seamless YouTube browsing with our optimized, low-impact extension.

🔒 **Privacy-Focused**: We respect your data - no personal information is collected or stored.

## Why Use YouTube Dislike Counter?

- Make informed viewing decisions based on community feedback
- Identify potentially misleading or low-quality content quickly
- Support content creators by providing valuable engagement metrics
- Enhance your YouTube experience with restored community features

Our extension uses data from the Return YouTube Dislike API, ensuring the most accurate and up-to-date dislike counts available.

## How It Works:

1. Install the extension
2. Browse YouTube as usual
3. See dislike counts and ratios automatically displayed on video pages
4. Customize the appearance in the extension popup

Empower your YouTube viewing experience today with YouTube Dislike Counter!

---

Note: This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by YouTube. Dislike counts are estimated based on user data and statistical extrapolation.

Got questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you! Use the 'Send Feedback' button in the extension or visit our support page.

Remember to rate and review if you find our extension helpful!
